REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0438 reute b f BC-OESTERREICHISCHE-DRAU 03-05 0053

TEXT.TITLE: OESTERREICHISCHE DRAUKRAFTWERKE SETS SFR BOND
TEXT.BODY: Oesterreichische Draukraftwerke AG of Klagenfurt is launching a 100 mln Swiss franc 4-3/4 pct 10-year bond priced at 100-1/4 pct, lead manager Swiss Bank Corp said. The issue is guaranteed by the Austrian state. Subscriptions close March 20. REUTER
